23constexpr RTPExtensionType RtpVideoLayersAllocationExtension::kId;
24constexpr const char RtpVideoLayersAllocationExtension::kUri[];
25
26namespace {
27
28constexpr int kMaxNumRtpStreams = 4;
29
30// TODO(bugs.webrtc.org/12000): share Leb128 functions with av1 packetizer.
31// Returns minimum number of bytes required to store `value`.
32int Leb128Size(uint32_t value) {
33 int size = 0;
34 while (value >= 0x80) {
35 ++size;
36 value >>= 7;
37 }
38 return size + 1;
39}
40
41// Returns number of bytes consumed.
42int WriteLeb128(uint32_t value, uint8_t* buffer) {
43 int size = 0;
44 while (value >= 0x80) {
45 buffer[size] = 0x80 | (value & 0x7F);
46 ++size;
47 value >>= 7;
48 }
49 buffer[size] = value;
50 ++size;
51 return size;
52}
53
54// Reads leb128 encoded value and advance read_at by number of bytes consumed.
55// Sets read_at to nullptr on error.
56uint64_t ReadLeb128(const uint8_t*& read_at, const uint8_t* end) {
57 uint64_t value = 0;
58 int fill_bits = 0;
59 while (read_at != end && fill_bits < 64 - 7) {
60 uint8_t leb128_byte = *read_at;
61 value |= uint64_t{leb128_byte & 0x7Fu} << fill_bits;
62 ++read_at;
63 fill_bits += 7;
64 if ((leb128_byte & 0x80) == 0) {
65 return value;
66 }
67 }
68 // Failed to find terminator leb128 byte.
69 read_at = nullptr;
70 return 0;
71}
72
73bool AllocationIsValid(const VideoLayersAllocation& allocation) {
74 // Since all multivalue fields are stored in (rtp_stream_id, spatial_id) order
75 // assume `allocation.active_spatial_layers` is already sorted. It is simpler
76 // to assemble it in the sorted way than to resort during serialization.
77 if (!absl::c_is_sorted(
78 allocation.active_spatial_layers,
79 [](const VideoLayersAllocation::SpatialLayer& lhs,
80 const VideoLayersAllocation::SpatialLayer& rhs) {
81 return std::make_tuple(lhs.rtp_stream_index, lhs.spatial_id) <
82 std::make_tuple(rhs.rtp_stream_index, rhs.spatial_id);
83 })) {
84 return false;
85 }
86
87 int max_rtp_stream_idx = 0;
88 for (const auto& spatial_layer : allocation.active_spatial_layers) {
89 if (spatial_layer.rtp_stream_index < 0 ||
90 spatial_layer.rtp_stream_index >= 4) {
91 return false;
92 }
93 if (spatial_layer.spatial_id < 0 || spatial_layer.spatial_id >= 4) {
94 return false;
95 }
96 if (spatial_layer.target_bitrate_per_temporal_layer.empty() ||
97 spatial_layer.target_bitrate_per_temporal_layer.size() > 4) {
98 return false;
99 }
100 if (max_rtp_stream_idx < spatial_layer.rtp_stream_index) {
101 max_rtp_stream_idx = spatial_layer.rtp_stream_index;
102 }
103 if (allocation.resolution_and_frame_rate_is_valid) {
104 // TODO(danilchap): Add check width and height are no more than 0x10000
105 // when width and height become larger type and thus would support maximum
106 // resolution.
107 if (spatial_layer.width <= 0) {
108 return false;
109 }
110 if (spatial_layer.height <= 0) {
111 return false;
112 }
113 if (spatial_layer.frame_rate_fps > 255) {
114 return false;
115 }
116 }
117 }
118 if (allocation.rtp_stream_index < 0 ||
119 (!allocation.active_spatial_layers.empty() &&
120 allocation.rtp_stream_index > max_rtp_stream_idx)) {
121 return false;
122 }
123 return true;
124}
125
126struct SpatialLayersBitmasks {
127 int max_rtp_stream_id = 0;
128 uint8_t spatial_layer_bitmask[kMaxNumRtpStreams] = {};
129 bool bitmasks_are_the_same = true;
130};
131
132SpatialLayersBitmasks SpatialLayersBitmasksPerRtpStream(
133 const VideoLayersAllocation& allocation) {
134 RTC_DCHECK(AllocationIsValid(allocation));
135 SpatialLayersBitmasks result;
136 for (const auto& layer : allocation.active_spatial_layers) {
137 result.spatial_layer_bitmask[layer.rtp_stream_index] |=
138 (1u << layer.spatial_id);
139 if (result.max_rtp_stream_id < layer.rtp_stream_index) {
140 result.max_rtp_stream_id = layer.rtp_stream_index;
141 }
142 }
143 for (int i = 1; i <= result.max_rtp_stream_id; ++i) {
144 if (result.spatial_layer_bitmask[i] != result.spatial_layer_bitmask[0]) {
145 result.bitmasks_are_the_same = false;
146 break;
147 }
148 }
149 return result;
150}
151
152} // namespace
153
154// +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
155// |RID| NS| sl_bm |
156// +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
157// Spatial layer bitmask |sl0_bm |sl1_bm |
158// up to 2 bytes |---------------|
159// when sl_bm == 0 |sl2_bm |sl3_bm |
160// +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
161// Number of temporal |#tl|#tl|#tl|#tl|
162// layers per spatial layer :---------------:
163// up to 4 bytes | ... |
164// +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
165// Target bitrate in kpbs | |
166// per temporal layer : ... :
167// leb128 encoded | |
168// +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
169// Resolution and framerate | |
170// 5 bytes per spatial layer + width-1 for +
171// (optional) | rid=0, sid=0 |
172// +---------------+
173// | |
174// + height-1 for +
175// | rid=0, sid=0 |
176// +---------------+
177// | max framerate |
178// +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
179// : ... :
180// +-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
181//
182// RID: RTP stream index this allocation is sent on, numbered from 0. 2 bits.
183// NS: Number of RTP streams - 1. 2 bits, thus allowing up-to 4 RTP streams.
184// sl_bm: BitMask of the active Spatial Layers when same for all RTP streams or
185// 0 otherwise. 4 bits thus allows up to 4 spatial layers per RTP streams.
186// slX_bm: BitMask of the active Spatial Layers for RTP stream with index=X.
187// byte-aligned. When NS < 2, takes ones byte, otherwise uses two bytes.
188// #tl: 2-bit value of number of temporal layers-1, thus allowing up-to 4
189// temporal layer per spatial layer. One per spatial layer per RTP stream.
190// values are stored in (RTP stream id, spatial id) ascending order.
191// zero-padded to byte alignment.
192// Target bitrate in kbps. Values are stored using leb128 encoding.
193// one value per temporal layer. values are stored in
194// (RTP stream id, spatial id, temporal id) ascending order.
195// All bitrates are total required bitrate to receive the corresponding
196// layer, i.e. in simulcast mode they include only corresponding spatial
197// layer, in full-svc all lower spatial layers are included. All lower
198// temporal layers are also included.
199// Resolution and framerate.
200// Optional. Presense is infered from the rtp header extension size.
201// Encoded (width - 1), 16-bit, (height - 1), 16-bit, max frame rate 8-bit
202// per spatial layer per RTP stream.
203// Values are stored in (RTP stream id, spatial id) ascending order.
204//
205// An empty layer allocation (i.e nothing sent on ssrc) is encoded as
206// special case with a single 0 byte.
207
208bool RtpVideoLayersAllocationExtension::Write(
209 rtc::ArrayView<uint8_t> data,
210 const VideoLayersAllocation& allocation) {
211 RTC_DCHECK(AllocationIsValid(allocation));
212 RTC_DCHECK_GE(data.size(), ValueSize(allocation));
213
214 if (allocation.active_spatial_layers.empty()) {
215 data[0] = 0;
216 return true;
217 }
218
219 SpatialLayersBitmasks slb = SpatialLayersBitmasksPerRtpStream(allocation);
220 uint8_t* write_at = data.data();
221 // First half of the header byte.
222 *write_at = (allocation.rtp_stream_index << 6);
223 // number of rtp stream - 1 is the same as the maximum rtp_stream_id.
224 *write_at |= slb.max_rtp_stream_id << 4;
225 if (slb.bitmasks_are_the_same) {
226 // Second half of the header byte.
227 *write_at |= slb.spatial_layer_bitmask[0];
228 } else {
229 // spatial layer bitmasks when they are different for different RTP streams.
230 *++write_at =
231 (slb.spatial_layer_bitmask[0] << 4) | slb.spatial_layer_bitmask[1];
232 if (slb.max_rtp_stream_id >= 2) {
233 *++write_at =
234 (slb.spatial_layer_bitmask[2] << 4) | slb.spatial_layer_bitmask[3];
235 }
236 }
237 ++write_at;
238
239 { // Number of temporal layers.
240 int bit_offset = 8;
241 *write_at = 0;
242 for (const auto& layer : allocation.active_spatial_layers) {
243 if (bit_offset == 0) {
244 bit_offset = 6;
245 *++write_at = 0;
246 } else {
247 bit_offset -= 2;
248 }
249 *write_at |=
250 ((layer.target_bitrate_per_temporal_layer.size() - 1) << bit_offset);
251 }
252 ++write_at;
253 }
254
255 // Target bitrates.
256 for (const auto& spatial_layer : allocation.active_spatial_layers) {
257 for (const DataRate& bitrate :
258 spatial_layer.target_bitrate_per_temporal_layer) {
259 write_at += WriteLeb128(bitrate.kbps(), write_at);
260 }
261 }
262
263 if (allocation.resolution_and_frame_rate_is_valid) {
264 for (const auto& spatial_layer : allocation.active_spatial_layers) {
265 ByteWriter<uint16_t>::WriteBigEndian(write_at, spatial_layer.width - 1);
266 write_at += 2;
267 ByteWriter<uint16_t>::WriteBigEndian(write_at, spatial_layer.height - 1);
268 write_at += 2;
269 *write_at = spatial_layer.frame_rate_fps;
270 ++write_at;
271 }
272 }
273 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(write_at - data.data(), ValueSize(allocation));
274 return true;
275}
276
277bool RtpVideoLayersAllocationExtension::Parse(
278 rtc::ArrayView<const uint8_t> data,
279 VideoLayersAllocation* allocation) {
280 if (data.empty() || allocation == nullptr) {
281 return false;
282 }
283
284 allocation->active_spatial_layers.clear();
285
286 const uint8_t* read_at = data.data();
287 const uint8_t* const end = data.data() + data.size();
288
289 if (data.size() == 1 && *read_at == 0) {
290 allocation->rtp_stream_index = 0;
291 allocation->resolution_and_frame_rate_is_valid = true;
292 return true;
293 }
294
295 // Header byte.
296 allocation->rtp_stream_index = *read_at >> 6;
297 int num_rtp_streams = 1 + ((*read_at >> 4) & 0b11);
298 uint8_t spatial_layers_bitmasks[kMaxNumRtpStreams];
299 spatial_layers_bitmasks[0] = *read_at & 0b1111;
300
301 if (spatial_layers_bitmasks[0] != 0) {
302 for (int i = 1; i < num_rtp_streams; ++i) {
303 spatial_layers_bitmasks[i] = spatial_layers_bitmasks[0];
304 }
305 } else {
306 // Spatial layer bitmasks when they are different for different RTP streams.
307 if (++read_at == end) {
308 return false;
309 }
310 spatial_layers_bitmasks[0] = *read_at >> 4;
311 spatial_layers_bitmasks[1] = *read_at & 0b1111;
312 if (num_rtp_streams > 2) {
313 if (++read_at == end) {
314 return false;
315 }
316 spatial_layers_bitmasks[2] = *read_at >> 4;
317 spatial_layers_bitmasks[3] = *read_at & 0b1111;
318 }
319 }
320 if (++read_at == end) {
321 return false;
322 }
323
324 // Read number of temporal layers,
325 // Create `allocation->active_spatial_layers` while iterating though it.
326 int bit_offset = 8;
327 for (int stream_idx = 0; stream_idx < num_rtp_streams; ++stream_idx) {
328 for (int sid = 0; sid < VideoLayersAllocation::kMaxSpatialIds; ++sid) {
329 if ((spatial_layers_bitmasks[stream_idx] & (1 << sid)) == 0) {
330 continue;
331 }
332
333 if (bit_offset == 0) {
334 bit_offset = 6;
335 if (++read_at == end) {
336 return false;
337 }
338 } else {
339 bit_offset -= 2;
340 }
341 int num_temporal_layers = 1 + ((*read_at >> bit_offset) & 0b11);
342 allocation->active_spatial_layers.emplace_back();
343 auto& layer = allocation->active_spatial_layers.back();
344 layer.rtp_stream_index = stream_idx;
345 layer.spatial_id = sid;
346 layer.target_bitrate_per_temporal_layer.resize(num_temporal_layers,
347 DataRate::Zero());
348 }
349 }
350 if (++read_at == end) {
351 return false;
352 }
353
354 // Target bitrates.
355 for (auto& layer : allocation->active_spatial_layers) {
356 for (DataRate& rate : layer.target_bitrate_per_temporal_layer) {
357 rate = DataRate::KilobitsPerSec(ReadLeb128(read_at, end));
358 if (read_at == nullptr) {
359 return false;
360 }
361 }
362 }
363
364 if (read_at == end) {
365 allocation->resolution_and_frame_rate_is_valid = false;
366 return true;
367 }
368
369 if (read_at + 5 * allocation->active_spatial_layers.size() != end) {
370 // data is left, but it size is not what can be used for resolutions and
371 // framerates.
372 return false;
373 }
374 allocation->resolution_and_frame_rate_is_valid = true;
375 for (auto& layer : allocation->active_spatial_layers) {
376 layer.width = 1 + ByteReader<uint16_t, 2>::ReadBigEndian(read_at);
377 read_at += 2;
378 layer.height = 1 + ByteReader<uint16_t, 2>::ReadBigEndian(read_at);
379 read_at += 2;
380 layer.frame_rate_fps = *read_at;
381 ++read_at;
382 }
383 return true;
384}
385
386size_t RtpVideoLayersAllocationExtension::ValueSize(
387 const VideoLayersAllocation& allocation) {
388 if (allocation.active_spatial_layers.empty()) {
389 return 1;
390 }
391 size_t result = 1; // header
392 SpatialLayersBitmasks slb = SpatialLayersBitmasksPerRtpStream(allocation);
393 if (!slb.bitmasks_are_the_same) {
394 ++result;
395 if (slb.max_rtp_stream_id >= 2) {
396 ++result;
397 }
398 }
399 // 2 bits per active spatial layer, rounded up to full byte, i.e.
400 // 0.25 byte per active spatial layer.
401 result += (allocation.active_spatial_layers.size() + 3) / 4;
402 for (const auto& spatial_layer : allocation.active_spatial_layers) {
403 for (DataRate value : spatial_layer.target_bitrate_per_temporal_layer) {
404 result += Leb128Size(value.kbps());
405 }
406 }
407 if (allocation.resolution_and_frame_rate_is_valid) {
408 result += 5 * allocation.active_spatial_layers.size();
409 }
410 return result;
411}
